content:
Based on the provided logs, I'll generate a comprehensive report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Plate Production Line
Consists of three stone furnaces in series:
- Furnace 1 at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace 2 at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace 3 at position (4.0, 4.0)

### Copper Cable Manufacturing Line
Located around position (9.5, 11.5), consists of:
- Assembling machine at (9.5, 11.5) producing copper cable
- Input burner inserter at (7.5, 11.5)
- Output burner inserter at (11.5, 11.5)
- Storage chest system:
  - Input chest at (6.5, 11.5) containing iron/copper plates
  - Output chest at (12.5, 11.5) containing mixed products
  - Additional storage at (14.5, 11.5) for iron plates
  - Copper plate storage at (16.5, 11.5)

### Power Generation System
Located around position (-7.0, 24.5), consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Boiler at (-7.0, 24.5)
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 24.5)
- Connected pipe network:
  - Water system (ID 26256) connecting pump to boiler
  - Steam system (ID 26258) connecting boiler to engine
- Electric pole network connecting power to facilities

### Science Pack Handling System
Located around position (0.5, 30.5), consists of:
- Storage chest at (0.5, 31.5) containing science packs
- Burner inserter at (0.5, 30.5) for automation

ERROR TIPS

### Research Prerequisites Errors
- Ensure all prerequisite technologies are researched before attempting advanced research
- Oil Processing requires Fluid Handling
- Fluid Handling requires Automation 2

### Inventory Management Issues
- Check inventory capacity before attempting to harvest resources
- Monitor chest capacities before inserting items
- Wooden chests have a capacity limit of 1600 items

### Resource Availability Errors
- Ensure coal is available before attempting to insert into machines
- Keep track of raw material requirements for crafting (like wood for wooden chests)

### Machine Operation Errors
- Verify machines contain expected items before attempting extraction
- Monitor assembler input/output states to ensure proper operation
- Ensure proper fuel levels in burner devices

### Entity Placement Issues
- Verify required items are in inventory before attempting to place entities
- Check space availability before placing new structures
